TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrintCapabilities extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义打印机的功能。

span.span: Defines the capabilities of a printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A对象是某种类型的调用的 XML 文档的简单-到-工作-与表示*PrintCapabilities 文档*。A object is an easy-to-work-with representation of a certain type of XML document called a *PrintCapabilities document*. 后者是所有打印机的功能和它们的当前设置的快照。The latter is a snapshot of all of a printer's capabilities and their current settings. 例如，如果打印机支持彩色打印，则文档将拥有``出将如何处理颜色输出设置的元素。For example, if the printer supports color printing, then the document would have a `` element that sets out how color output will be handled. 元素，反过来，由表示属性对象。The element is, in turn, represented by the property of the object. 如果打印机不支持颜色，则没有任何``的值和文档中的元素属性是`null`。If the printer does not support color, then there is no `` element in the document and the value of the property is `null`. PrintCapabilities 文档必须符合[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)。The PrintCapabilities document must conform to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397). 类使你的应用程序，以获得打印机的功能而无需进行的任何直接读取 XML对象。The class enables your application to obtain a printer's capabilities without having to engage in any direct reading of XML objects. 所有文件和照片打印机，对于家庭和企业，最常用的功能通过封装类。All of the most popular features of file and photo printers, for both home and business, are encapsulated by the class. 但是[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)定义多，通常，不功能和它可以进行扩展以便处理 specialty 打印设备的功能。But the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) defines many more, less common, features and it can be extended to handle features of specialty printing devices. 因此，尽管和类不能被继承，可以扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)能够识别并不表示中的打印设备功能或类。So, although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. **请注意**时了采用 PrintCapabilities 文档的构造函数创建对象 (作为) 参数，该整个文档存储在该对象，包括它的 XML 元素中的非公共字段express 不由任何的公共属性表示的不太常见功能类。**Note** When the object is created with the constructor that takes a PrintCapabilities document (as a ) parameter, that entire document is stored in a non-public field in the object, including the XML elements within it that express less common features that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 事实上，如果生成 PrintCapabilities 文档驱动程序正在使用的专用扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)、 的私人定义标记也存储为非公共 PrintCapabilities 文档的一部分。In fact, if the driver that produced the PrintCapabilities document is using a private extension of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), that privately defined markup is also stored as part of the non-public PrintCapabilities document. > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定特定打印机的功能以及如何配置打印作业以充分利用它们。The following example shows how to determine the capabilities of a specific printer and how to configure a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream xmlStream) cil managed

param.name: xmlStream
param.span: 描述打印机功能并符合打印架构的 XML 。

span.span: An XML that describes printer capabilities and conforms to the Print Schema.

summary.span: 使用指定打印机功能并符合 XML [打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的 XML 流（其中包含 PrintCapabilities 文档）初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using an XML stream (that contains a PrintCapabilities document) that specifies printer capabilities and complies with the XML [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 整个 PrintCapabilities 文档存储在中的对象，包括 express 不由任何的公共属性表示的不太常见功能的 XML 元素中的非公共字段类。The entire PrintCapabilities document is stored in a non-public field in the object, including the XML elements within it that express less common features that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 事实上，如果生成 PrintCapabilities 文档驱动程序正在使用的专用扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)、 的私人定义标记也存储为非公共 PrintCapabilities 文档的一部分。In fact, if the driver that produced the PrintCapabilities document is using a private extension of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), that privately defined markup is also stored as part of the non-public PrintCapabilities document. 的文档中，如果有的话，将不验证私有部分由构造函数中，但所有**打印架构**-定义的部分进行验证，包括未由任何的公共属性的部分类。The private parts of the document, if any, are not validated by the constructor, but all **Print Schema**-defined parts are validated, including the parts that are not represented by any of the public properties of the class. 相应地，可能即使所有的公共属性对应的 XML 标记无效时引发。Accordingly, the could be thrown even if all of the XML markup that corresponds to the public properties is valid.

span.span: is .
is not valid XML.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CollationCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of Collation)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机的排序功能。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify the collation capabilities of a printer.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用标准打印机通常逐份打印输出通过与打印每个页上的第一个副本，然后每一页为第二个副本，依次类推。A standard printer typically collates output by printing every page of the first copy, then every page of the second copy, and so on. 当使用标准打印机不逐份打印时，它将打印的第一页中，每个副本，请为第二个页上，依次类推每个复制。When a standard printer does not collate, it prints every copy of the first page, then every copy of the second page, and so on. 一些打印机是专门配备有整理箱。这些专门配备打印机的打印顺序可能不同于标准打印机;但是结果是相同的： 多分页打印作业的每个副本包含正确的序列中的所有其页，而无需手动排序。Some printers are specially equipped with collating bins. The printing sequence for these specially equipped printers may differ from those of standard printers; however the outcome is the same: each copy of a multi-paged print job contains all its pages in the proper sequence without manual sorting. 如果打印机不支持排序规则，该集合为空。If the printer does not support collation, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`DocumentCollate`关键字，不`JobCollateAllDocuments`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `DocumentCollate` keyword, not the `JobCollateAllDocuments` keyword. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性来确定特定打印机的功能以及如何配置打印作业以充分利用它们。The following example shows how to use this property to determine the capabilities of a specific printer and how to configure a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DeviceFontSubstitutionCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of DeviceFontSubstitution)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机是否可以用基于设备的字体替换基于计算机的字体，以及如何进行替换。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify whether and how a printer can substitute device-based fonts for computer-based fonts.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持设备字体替换，集合为空。If the printer does not support device font substitution, the collection is empty. 如果它确实支持字体替换，驱动程序应同时包含和集合中的值。If it does support font substitution, the driver should include both the and values in the collection. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageDeviceFontSubstitution`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageDeviceFontSubstitution` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DuplexingCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of Duplexing)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机是否可以执行双面打印，以及如何执行双面打印。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify whether and how a printer can perform two-sided printing.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持双工，集合为空。If the printer does not support duplexing, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobDuplexAllDocumentsContiguously`关键字，不`DocumentDuplex`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobDuplexAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentDuplex` keyword. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性来确定特定打印机的功能以及如何配置打印作业以充分利用它们。The following example shows how to use this property to determine the capabilities of a specific printer and how to configure a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InputBinCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of InputBin)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于指示使用哪个送纸盒（纸盒）。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that indicate what input bin (paper tray) is used.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的功能`JobInputBin`，如果设备支持功能; 否则，它表示`DocumentInputBin`，如果支持功能; 否则，它表示`PageInputBin`。This property represents the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s feature `JobInputBin`, if that feature is supported by the device; otherwise, it represents `DocumentInputBin`, if that feature is supported; otherwise, it represents `PageInputBin`. 如果打印机不支持这些功能，该集合为空。If the printer does not support any of these features, the collection is empty.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MaxCopyCount As Nullable(Of Integer)
public: property Nullable<int> MaxCopyCount { Nullable<int> get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示设备在一次打印作业中所能打印的最大副本数。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the maximum number of copies that the device can print in a single print job.

value.span: 一个可以为 null 的 值，它指定打印机所能打印的最大副本数。

span.span: A nullable value that specifies the maximum number of copies that a printer can print.

value.span: 如果设备驱动程序不报告最大值，则返回 。

span.span: Returns if the device driver does not report a maximum.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobCopiesAllDocuments`关键字，不`DocumentCopiesAllPages`关键字，或`PageCopies`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobCopiesAllDocuments` keyword, not the `DocumentCopiesAllPages` keyword, or the `PageCopies` keyword. 如果打印机可以打印无限制的副本，属性值为 9999。If the printer can print unlimited copies, the property value is 9999.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OrientedPageMediaHeight As Nullable(Of Double)
public: property Nullable<double> OrientedPageMediaHeight { Nullable<double> get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示页面中成像区域高度的值，其中高度表示与页面方向相对应的垂直尺寸。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the height of the imageable area on a page, where height means the vertical dimension relative to the page's orientation.

value.span: 一个可以为 null 的 值，该值表示打印机可在页面中打印的区域的高度（以像素为单位，即以 1/96 英寸递增）。

span.span: A nullable value indicating the height, in pixels, which are 1/96 inch increments, of the area on a page that the printer is capable of printing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数打印机必须将保留的页后，可以防止墨粉移动工作表的打印机的部分上边缘沿页面的区域。Most printers must leave an unprinted area along the edges of a page to prevent toner from getting on the parts of the printer that move the sheets. 此属性对应于**ImageableSizeHeight**属性[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageImageableSize`关键字。This property corresponds to the **ImageableSizeHeight** property of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageImageableSize` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OrientedPageMediaWidth As Nullable(Of Double)
public: property Nullable<double> OrientedPageMediaWidth { Nullable<double> get(); };

summary.span: 获取表示页面中成像区域宽度的值，其中宽度表示与页面方向相对应的水平尺寸。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the width of the imageable area on a page, where width means the horizontal dimension relative to the page's orientation.

value.span: 一个可以为 null 的 值，该值表示打印机可在页面中打印的区域的宽度（以像素为单位，即以 1/96 英寸递增）。

span.span: A nullable value indicating the width, in pixels, which are 1/96 inch increments, of the area on a page that the printer is capable of printing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数打印机必须将保留的页后，可以防止墨粉移动工作表的打印机的部分上边缘沿页面的区域。Most printers must leave an unprinted area along the edges of a page to prevent toner from getting on the parts of the printer that move the sheets. 此属性对应于`ImageableSizeWidth`属性[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageImageableSize`关键字。This property corresponds to the `ImageableSizeWidth` property of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageImageableSize` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OutputColorCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of OutputColor)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于指定打印机对于带有彩色和灰阶内容的打印方法。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that specify the ways in which a printer can print content with color and shades of gray.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持输出颜色选项，该集合为空。If the printer does not support output color options, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageOutputColor`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageOutputColor` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OutputQualityCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of OutputQuality)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于指示打印机支持的输出质量的类型。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that indicate the types of output quality the printer supports.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，枚举具有值为， ，和质量，等等。For example, the enumeration has values for , , and quality, among others. 如果打印机不支持输出质量所选内容，该集合为空。If the printer does not support output quality selection, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageOutputQuality`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageOutputQuality` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageBorderlessCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageBorderless)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于指示打印机是否可以打印到介质的边缘。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that indicate whether the printer can print up to the edge of the media.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数激光和喷墨打印机不支持无边框打印。Most laser and inkjet printers do not support borderless printing. 它们必须留有一定以防止墨粉移动纸张的打印机的部分上。They must allow an unprinted margin to prevent toner from getting on the parts of the printer that move the paper. 但是，许多照片打印机，并支持边框打印。Many photographic printers, however, do support borderless printing. 如果打印机不支持无边框打印，集合为空。If the printer does not support borderless printing, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageBorderless`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageBorderless` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageImageableArea As PageImageableArea
public: property System::Printing::PageImageableArea ^ PageImageableArea { System::Printing::PageImageableArea ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象用于表示打印机所能使用页面的区域。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the area of a page that the printer can use.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象用于指定成像区域左上角的距离（以像素为单位，即 1/96 英寸为一个单位）。

span.span: A object that specifies the distance, in pixels (units of 1/96 inch), of the upper-left corner of the imageable area.

value.span: 垂直距离是从纸的上边开始测量的，水平距离是从纸的左边开始测量的。

span.span: The vertical distance is measured from the top edge of the paper and the horizontal distance is measured from the left edge.

value.span: 返回值还指定成像区域的宽度和高度。

span.span: The return value also specifies the width and height of the imageable area.

value.span: 如果打印机的驱动程序不报告成像区域，则此属性为 null。

span.span: If the printer driver does not report an imageable area, then this property is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数激光和喷墨打印机必须留有一定围绕页后，可以防止墨粉移动工作表的打印机的部分上边缘。Most laser and inkjet printers must allow an unprinted margin around the edges of a page to prevent toner from getting on the parts of the printer that move the sheets. 许多照片打印机，但是，可以使用整个页面打印图像。Many photographic printers, however, can use the entire page to print an image.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageMediaSizeCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageMediaSize)

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象用于标识打印机支持的纸张和介质的尺寸。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that identify the paper and media sizes that a printer supports.
A of objects.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageMediaTypeCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageMediaType)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机支持的纸张和其他介质的类型。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify what types of paper and other media a printer supports.

value.span: 值（这些值用于指定打印介质，如卡片纸、标签、普通纸或照片纸）的一个 。

span.span: A of values specifying the print media, such as card stock, label, plain, or photographic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持媒体类型选择，该集合为空。If the printer does not support media type selection, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageMediaType`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageMediaType` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageOrderCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageOrder)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于指示打印机是否能够从前往后和/或从后往前打印多页文档。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that indicate whether a printer is capable of printing multiple-page documents from front-to-back, back-to-front, or both ways.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持页面顺序选择，该集合为空。If the printer does not support page order selection, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobPageOrder`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobPageOrder` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageOrientationCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageOrientation)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机支持的页面方向的类型。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify what types of page orientation a printer supports.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持页面方向选择，该集合为空。If the printer does not support page orientation selection, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageOrientation`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageOrientation` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageResolutionCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PageResolution)

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象用于标识打印机支持的页面分辨率的等级。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that identify what levels of page resolution the printer supports.
A of objects.

value.span: 每一个值以定性值和/或每英寸点数值来表示页面分辨率。

span.span: Each value represents a page resolution as a qualitative value, a dots-per-inch value, or both.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageScalingFactorRange As PageScalingFactorRange
public: property System::Printing::PageScalingFactorRange ^ PageScalingFactorRange { System::Printing::PageScalingFactorRange ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取打印机可在页面中放大或缩小打印图像的最大和最小百分比。

span.span: Gets the maximum and minimum percentages by which a printer can enlarge or reduce the print image on a page.

value.span: 具有 和 属性（包含表示百分比的 值）的 对象。

span.span: A object with and properties holding values that represent percentages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这属性通常表示[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageScaling`关键字。This property generally represents the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageScaling` keyword. 但有一些复杂性，如下所示。But there are some complexities as follows. - 如果 PrintCapabilities 文档没有`PageScaling`元素，或它有一个，但既不其**CustomSquare**也不**自定义**选项定义; 则属性为 null。If the PrintCapabilities document does not have a `PageScaling` element, or it has one, but neither its **CustomSquare** nor **Custom** options are defined; then the property is null. - 在所有其他情况下，该属性的行为如下所示。In all other cases, the property's behavior is as follows. 属性属性的对象是以下值的最小值。The property of the property's object is the smallest of the following values. - **MinValue**属性`PageScalingScaleWidth`提供的值的数据类型**自定义**选项的**ScaleWidth** `ScoredProperty`。The **MinValue** property of the `PageScalingScaleWidth` datatype that provides the value of the **Custom** option’s **ScaleWidth** `ScoredProperty`. - **MinValue**属性`PageScalingScaleHeight`提供的值的数据类型**自定义**选项的**ScaleHeight** `ScoredProperty`。The **MinValue** property of the `PageScalingScaleHeight` datatype that provides the value of the **Custom** option’s **ScaleHeight** `ScoredProperty`. - **MinValue**属性`PageScalingScale`提供的值的数据类型**CustomSquare**选项的**缩放** `ScoredProperty`。The **MinValue** property of the `PageScalingScale` datatype that provides the value of the **CustomSquare** option’s **Scale** `ScoredProperty`. 属性属性的对象是以下值的最大值。The property of the property's object is the largest of the following values. - **MaxValue**属性`PageScalingScaleWidth`提供的值的数据类型**自定义**选项的**ScaleWidth** `ScoredProperty`。The **MaxValue** property of the `PageScalingScaleWidth` datatype that provides the value of the **Custom** option’s **ScaleWidth** `ScoredProperty`. - **MaxValue**属性`PageScalingScaleHeight`提供的值的数据类型**自定义**选项的**ScaleHeight** `ScoredProperty`。The **MaxValue** property of the `PageScalingScaleHeight` datatype that provides the value of the **Custom** option’s **ScaleHeight** `ScoredProperty`. - **MaxValue**属性`PageScalingScale`提供的值的数据类型**CustomSquare**选项的**缩放** `ScoredProperty`。The **MaxValue** property of the `PageScalingScale` datatype that provides the value of the **CustomSquare** option’s **Scale** `ScoredProperty`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PagesPerSheetCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of Integer)

summary.span: 获取整数的集合，每一个整数用于标识用户可以选择在一页纸的单面上所打印的页数。

span.span: Gets a collection of integers, each identifying the number of pages that a user can choose to print on a single side of a sheet of paper.

value.span: 值的一个 ，这些值表示打印机支持的、用于在每一面上打印多页的选项。

span.span: A of values representing the options that a printer supports for printing more than one page per side.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数打印机支持有限的数量的特定选项，如 1、 2、 4、 6、 9 和一面。Most printers support only a limited number of specific options, such as 1, 2, 4, 6, 9, and 16 pages per side. 如果打印机不支持每个表的多个页，该集合为空。If the printer does not support multiple pages per sheet, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于`PagesPerSheet ScoredProperty`的[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously`关键字，不`DocumentNUp`关键字。This property corresponds to the `PagesPerSheet ScoredProperty` of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentNUp` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PagesPerSheetDirectionCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PagesPerSheetDirection)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机支持的、用于在每一张纸的单面上呈现多页的模式。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify what patterns a printer supports for presenting multiple pages on a single side of a sheet of paper.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，一些打印机可以呈现页中从左到右行与行堆积上到。For example, some printers can present pages in left-to-right rows with the rows stacked top-to-bottom. 另一种模式，一些打印机支持，为从右向左的行与行堆积从下到。Another pattern, which some printers support, is right-to-left rows with the rows stacked bottom-to-top. 如果打印机不支持每个表的多个页，该集合为空。If the printer does not support multiple pages per sheet, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于`PresentationDirection`subfeature 的[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously`关键字，不`DocumentNUp`关键字。This property corresponds to the `PresentationDirection` subfeature of the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobNUpAllDocumentsContiguously` keyword, not the `DocumentNUp` keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PhotoPrintingIntentCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of PhotoPrintingIntent)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机支持的、用于打印照片的质量选项。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify the quality options the printer supports for printing photographs.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持的照片质量的选项，该集合为空。If the printer does not support options for photographic quality, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PagePhotoPrintingIntent`。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PagePhotoPrintingIntent`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StaplingCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of Stapling)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机支持的自动装订的类型。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify the types of automatic stapling that a printer supports.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持装订，集合为空。If the printer does not support stapling, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`JobStapleAllDocuments`关键字，不`DocumentStaple`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `JobStapleAllDocuments` keyword, not the `DocumentStaple` keyword. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性来确定特定打印机的功能以及如何配置打印作业以充分利用它们。The following example shows how to use this property to determine the capabilities of a specific printer and how to configure a print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TrueTypeFontModeCapability As ReadOnlyCollection(Of TrueTypeFontMode)

summary.span: 获取值的集合，这些值用于标识打印机支持的、用于处理 TrueType 字体的方法。

span.span: Gets a collection of values that identify the methods that a printer supports for handling TrueType fonts.
A of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果打印机不支持对于 TrueType 字体的特殊处理的任何方法，该集合为空。If the printer does not support any method of special handling for TrueType fonts, the collection is empty. 此属性对应于[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)的`PageTrueTypeFontMode`关键字。This property corresponds to the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)'s `PageTrueTypeFontMode` keyword.
